transcript: I'm trying to get to $10 million over the span of my life ideally as fast as possible I want to tell you a different strategy that I think is wildly underrated you can go and become an employee they say we'll give you 0 2% per year times 5 years over that time period the company goes public for a billion then your stock is worth $10 million and then you have something that is worth $10 million that you can then take loans against and you two can live like the ultra rich and take those loans taxfree
